section.heading: Placement of certain director of school facility positions

content.p:
Supervisor of Buildings and Grounds - Albany City School District,
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds, Director of Facilities,
Director of Facilities and Transportation, Director of Facilities and
Operations - Albany County;
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds - Allegany County;\n
Director of School Facilities I, II and III; Director of School\nFacilities and Operations III - Broome County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings & Grounds - Cattaraugus County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds - Cayuga County;\n

Facilities Manager - Forestville School, Maintenance and
Transportation Manager - Ripley CSD, Superintendent of Buildings and
Grounds, Superintendent of Buildings and Transportation - Dunkirk School
District, Senior Building and Maintenance Mechanic - Fredonia CSD,
Director of Facilities and Operations and Superintendent of Buildings
and Grounds - City of Jamestown - Chautauqua County;
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds, Supervisor of Buildings\nand Grounds - Chemung County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds - Chenango County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds - Cortland County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds, Head Custodian - Franklin\nCSD, Margaretville CSD & South Kortwright CSD - Delaware County;\n
Director of Facilities and Operations I, II, III - Dutchess\nCounty;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds - Erie County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds; Superintendent of\nBuildings, Grounds and Transportation - Essex County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds, Director of Facilities\nand Operations I & II; Director of Facilities - Franklin County;\n
Supervisor of Buildings and Grounds - Genesee County;\n

Supervisor of Buildings and Grounds, Superintendent of Buildings
and Grounds, Director of Facilities, Director of School Facilities,
Director of Facilities and Transportation, Director of Facilities and
Operations - Greene County;
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds - Livingston County;\n
Superintendent of Buildings and Grounds, Supervisor of Buildings\nand Grounds - Madison County;\n
Director of Buildings and Grounds, Superintendent of Buildings and\nGrounds - Monroe County;\n

Supervisor of Buildings and Grounds, Superintendent of Buildings
and Grounds, Director of Facilities, Director of Facilities and
Transportation, Director of Facilities and Operations - Montgomery
County;
